All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
public class RangePartitioner
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Partitioner<org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
implements org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable

Ranger partitioner. In the context of graph algorithms, ensures that consecutive node ids are blocked together.

Author:
Jimmy Lin, Michael Schatz
